title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Creating a less detailed and more flexible schedule works to your advantage today. Unfortunately, your expectations may be dashed if your plans are too rigid or you place too much faith in a single idea. Instead, start with a general strategy and rely on your intuition to fine-tune it along the way. Improvise as needed, yet keep the integrity and feel of your overall vision. Everything flows smoothly when you use the powers of your mind to anticipate both problems and promising opportunities. Muhammad Ali said, The man who has no imagination has no wings. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
